home.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Dambulla Dedicated Economic Center
home.description: Our mission is to provide essential vegetables, fruits, and grains to Sri Lankans at affordable prices while ensuring fair returns to farmers, supporting waste-free, high-quality agriculture. We aim to uplift farmersâ€™ incomes, strengthen Dambulla's wholesale trade, generate thousands of jobs, and revitalize domestic agriculture for national development.
